faq.question: Does it work for systematic reviews?
faq.answer: Yes! Supports systematic review workflows including PRISMA stages, quality assessment, and structured data extraction.

faq.question: Can it generate comparison tables?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Export all papers' key characteristics (methods, findings, etc.) to Excel for easy comparison and analysis.

faq.question: How many papers can I review?
faq.answer: Pro plan: 200 papers. Team plan: 1,000+ papers. Perfect for comprehensive literature reviews and meta-analyses.

faq.question: Does it identify research gaps?
faq.answer: Yes! AI analyzes all papers and highlights common themes, contradictions, and areas lacking research.

faq.question: Can I collaborate with coauthors?
faq.answer: Yes! Team plan includes shared workspaces. Multiple researchers can screen papers and extract data collaboratively.

faq.question: What about citation management?
faq.answer: Export citations in any format (APA, BibTeX, etc.). Integrates with Zotero, Mendeley, and other reference managers.
